summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3218, for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers along the following described route to- wit: in 63rd Avenue Southwest from Beach Drive to Admiral Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39803 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
